question: Please provide the meaning and source of the following.
answer:
QUESTION
Recitation: SUBHANALLAHI WA BIHAMDIHI, WA ADADA KHALKHIHI, WA RIZA NAFSIHI, WA ZEENATA ARSHIHI WA MIDADA KALIMAATIHI. Also, please make any corrections in the above.
ANSWER


Share:
The correct pronunciation of this zikr is Subhaanallahi Wa Bihamdihi Adada Khalqihi wa Ridha Nafsihi Wa Zinata Arshihi Wa Midaada Kalimaatih.

The meaning of this zikr is: Glory be to Allah and all praise is for Allah as many times as the number of His creation and in accordance with His pleasure and to the weight of His throne and to the extent of the ink used in His words. (Muslim #2726)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

FOR-Mufti Ebrahim Desai

FATWA DEPT.
